role.argrole: place where arg0 is in practice

example.parse: (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 荒僻))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 海口) (NN 乡镇))) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 作兴) (NP-OBJ (DP (DT 这些)) (ADJP (JJ 时髦)) (NP (NN 玩意))))))
example.arg: 这些 时髦 玩意
*OP* *T*-1 荒僻 的 海口 乡镇
